rukus.text: wlqd mnnna ealaa musaa waharun balnbwt walrsalt, wanajaynahuma waqawmahuma min alghrq, wama kanuu fih min ebwdyt wmadhllat
wlqd mnnna ealaa musaa waharun balnbwt walrsalt, wanajaynahuma waqawmahuma min alghrq, wama kanuu fih min ebwdyt wmadhllat
wnsrnahm, fakanat lahum aleizat walnsrt walghlbt ealaa fireawn walh
watynahma altawrat albynt, wahadaynahuma altariq almustaqim aldhy la aewjaj fyh, wahu al'islam din allah aladhi abteth bih anbya'h, wabqyna lahuma thna'an hsnana wdhkrana jamilana fymn bedhma

thyt lmwsa waharun min eind allh, wthna' wdea' lahuma balslamt min kuli aft, kama jzynahma aljaza' alhasan najzi almuhsinin min eibadina almukhlasin lana bialsidq wal'iiman waleml. 'iinahuma min eibadina alraskhyn fi al'iyman

w'in eabdana 'iilyas lamin aladhin akrmnahm balnbwt walrsalt, 'iidh qal liqawmih min bani 'israyyl: ataquu allah wahdah wkhafwh, wala tushrikuu maeah ghyrh, kayf taebudun snmana, wttrkwn eibadat allah 'ahsan alkhalqyn, wahu rabakum aladhi khlqkm, wakhalaq aba'akum almadyn qblkm?

fkdhb qawm 'iilyas nbyhm, flyjmenhm allah yawm alqiamat llhsab waleqab, 'iilaa eibad allah aladhin akhlsu dinahum llh, fa'iinahum najwn min edhabh
fkdhb qawm 'iilyas nbyhm, flyjmenhm allah yawm alqiamat llhsab waleqab, 'iilaa eibad allah aladhin akhlsu dinahum llh, fa'iinahum najwn min edhabh

wajaealna l'ilyas thna'an jamilaan fi al'umam baedah. tahiatan min allh, wthna' ealaa 'ilyas. wakama jzyna 'iilyas aljaza' alhasan ealaa taeth, najzi almuhsinin min eibadina almwmnyn. 'iinah min eibad allah almuminin almukhlasin lah aleamilin bawamrh

wjelna l'ilyas thna'an jamilaan fi al'umam baedah. tahiatan min allh, wthna' ealaa 'ilyas. wakama jzyna 'iilyas aljaza' alhasan ealaa taeth, najzi almuhsinin min eibadina almwmnyn. 'iinah min eibad allah almuminin almukhlasin lah aleamilin bawamrh

w'in eabdana lwtana astfynah, fajaealnah min almrslyn, 'iidh najaynah wa'ahlah 'ajmaein min aledhab, 'iilaa ejwzana harimt, hi zwjth, hlkt mae aladhin hlku min qawmaha lkfrha

thm 'ahlakna albaqin almukadhibin min qwmh
w'inkm -ya 'ahl "mk"- latamuruwn fi asfarkm ealaa manazil qawm lut watharahum waqt alsbah, wtmrwn ealayha lyla. 'afala teqlwn, ftkhafu 'an yusibakum mithl ma asabhm?
